name: Parallax UINavigatorController for iPhone
body:
# Parallax UINavigatorController for iPhone

# About
it is UI tweak for UINavigationController.
Have you see parallax background on Android Main screen. It's the same but for iPhone.

# how to use 
It's very easy. You can extend your current application by simple steps: 
1. put 2 files from 'ParallaxUINavigatorController lib' to your project 
2. add to your project image that will be used for Parallax 
3. update your applicatio .plist by item "ParallaxBackground" with name of image sfom step 3 
4. in storyboar change class name (section 'custom class' in properties window) from UINavigatorController to ParallaxUINavigationController

#example
This project contains Example in 'ParallaxUINavigatorController'.
You can check functionality from there.

# License
MIT license is applicable for this lib.


#video
[video example](http://youtu.be/mj3OZJzZmb0)
